data.title: Gagosian
data.meta_description: Gagosian is a global network of art galleries specializing in modern and contemporary art with nineteen exhibition spaces across New York, Los Angeles, London, Paris, Rome, Geneva, Basel, Gstaad, Athens, and Hong Kong.
data.text:
Wednesday, August 21, 2024, 4pm

Gagosian, Gstaad

Join Roe Ethridge for a tour of his exhibition Happy Birthday Louise Parker II, on view at Gagosian, Gstaad, through September 8. Named for a model with whom he collaborated on several fashion editorials beginning in 2010, the exhibition explores the artistâ€™s diverse array of subjects, from still-life arrangements to fashion shoots and portraits. Ethridge will discuss how he juxtaposes staged scenes with chanced-upon vignettes in his pursuit of a formal sensibility that hinges on the bending and breaking of aesthetic rules.
